item.title: The Game Is On
item.description: 2-3 months ago, I was surfing the web and found an article titled Why I studied full-time for 8 months for a Google interview. The article is written by John Washam, who is a self-taught web developer with 15 years of experience. While he was seeking a career change he wanted to join Google as Software Engineer. But he doesn’t have any computer science degree and doesn’t have the knowledge that large companies expect from candidates.
